name: Defruiter
description:
F.R.U.I.T. (False Replies Unsynchronized In Time)  is a problem in radar systems where bad information is received and displayed. Your job as a defruiter is to identify and remove the bad fruits!

A game made by :
backtothedrawingboard3 (art)
LunarPractice (Music)
Alex Jenkins (Audio)
Déborah Nash (prog + logo)

For weekly Game jam 124, theme : fruitball
